entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this morning then changing to periods of rain near noon and ending this afternoon then 30 percent chance of rain later this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain early this evening and 40 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and 30 percent chance of rain showers late in the afternoon.
